data: CARD SURG Pre Operative Outpatient (Pre Anesthesia Clinic)
Select CARD Outpatient Anticoagulant Management PowerPlan if bridging is required
Patient to shower evening prior to surgery or morning of surgery and to cleanse skin with chlorhexidine gluconate 2% or 4% following shower
If AM case Instruct patient to be NPO from midnight
Instruct patient to take last dose of ASA 4 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of ASA 1 day before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of clopidogrel or ticagrelor 6 days before surgery date unless drug eluting stent present
Instruct patient to take last dose of clopidogrel or ticagrelor 3 days before surgery date unless drug eluting stent present
Instruct patient to take last dose of clopidogrel or ticagrelor 8 days before surgery date unless drug eluting stent present
Instruct patient to take last dose of prasugrel 8 days before surgery date unless drug eluting stent present
Instruct patient to take last dose of warfarin 6 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of dabigatran 4 days before surgery date for eGFR greater than 50 mL/min
Instruct patient to take last dose of dabigatran 6 days before surgery date for eGFR 30 to 50 mL/min
Instruct patient to take last dose of dabigatran 8 days before surgery date for eGFR less than 30 mL/min
Instruct patient to take last dose of factor Xa Inhibitors (rivaroxaban or apixaban) 4 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of factor Xa Inhibitors (rivaroxaban or apixaban) 3 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of low molecular weight heparin (enoxaparin) 2 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of low molecular weight heparin (dalteparin) 4 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of ACE Inhibitors / ARB (ramipril, candesartan) 3 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of diuretics  1 day before surgery date
Instruct patient to continue beta blocker on the morning of surgery
Instruct patient to continue calcium channel blocker on the morning of surgery
Instruct patient to take last dose of vitamins and herbal supplements 8 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of diabetes medications 1 day before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of diabetes medications (SGLT2 inhibitors) 3 days before surgery date
Instruct patient to take last dose of diabetes medications (SGLT2 inhibitors) 4 days before surgery date
Do not order the following if done and available within 48 hours of admission
Basic Metabolic Panel (Lytes, Urea, Creat, Gluc)
Liver Panel (Bilirubin, ALP, Alb, ALT, GGT)
Hepatitis B Core Antibody Total BCCDC
Hepatitis B Core Antibody Total PHC
HIV 1/2 Antibody and p24 Antigen BCCDC
HIV 1/2 Antibody and p24 Antigen PHC
Deep Wound, Urgent, Collection: T;N, once
Do not order Chest X-ray if done within the last 48 hours or within 6 weeks for elective patients. Do not order Electrocardiogram 12 Lead if done within 48 hours of admission
Routine, Reason: Pre-operative cardiac surgery evaluation, Order for future visit
Routine, Reason: Pre-operative cardiac surgery evaluation, Transport: Portable, Portable Reason: Requires constant monitoring/observation, Order for future visit
Routine, Reason: Other (Must Specify), Additional Reason: Pre-operative evaluation, Order for future visit
Routine, Schedule as: Outpatient, Primary Indication: Other (please specify), Special Instructions: Pre-operative evaluation
Consider consultation with psychiatry, device clinic, electrophysiology, infectious disease
Consider consultation with Hematology if bridging is required
For infected device consider consultation with Infectious Disease for home IV therapy
